attributes.action: Remove the granite balls forthwith from the Newmarket clocktower roundabout.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Suffolk County Council in their wisdom have decided to waste taxpayers money on 12 granite balls with no consultation to the residents of the said town making the entrance to Newmarket an eyesore these balls are dangerous and sinister.
They must be removed and replaced with a roundabout that is democraticaly agreed.
How dare Suffolk County Council put this monstroscity in our town that we pay for without any consultation.

Please join us to make a stand against these dictators and make our once easy to use roundabout become that once again with no balls in view.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Remove the granite balls forthwith from the Newmarket clocktower roundabout."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page20297


Prime Minister's Office
